As the world of work continues to evolve, we are bringing together the individuals, ideas and technology to unlock business and human growth.The tasks, roles and responsibilities pertaining to the job role of an Analyst will include the following:Preparing withholding tax computations/advance tax computations

General correspondence over emails
Visiting tax department for regular follow-up/enquiries etc.Filing and record keepingHiring for MUMBAIMBA or MCOMWorking in this discipline will see an Analyst working on engagements and teams (the sizes of which will vary depending on client/project).To qualify for the same an Analyst will need:Graduate from a recognised University with 0-2 year of relevant experience
Specialized knowledge of Excel would be added advantage
Relevant experience in payroll, personal tax compliances would be added advantage
Other prerequisite skills include:
Good written and verbal communication skills
Efficiency in MS office
 Ability to work/pick-up on specific software and other technology tools
